name: gpt-wolf
description: Bot di trading aggressivo per futures con leva alta

scripts.dev:full: concurrently "bun run api:dev" "bun run frontend:dev" "bun run trade" --names "API,FE.,BOT" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow"
scripts.build: bun build packages/worker/src/trade.ts packages/worker/src/scanner.ts packages/worker/src/analyze.ts packages/api/src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node
scripts.build:tsc: tsc -b packages/core packages/db packages/strategies packages/worker packages/api
